title: Some SMS messages are not sent correctly intermittently : "Tap to try again."
content:
Hi everyone,
I own a Pixel 3a and intermittently SMS don't send properly and ask me to « Tap to try again ». I am using Android message application.The connection is fine when the problem occurs and generally I can resend the SMS shortly after. The rest of the time, everything seems to be fine.

I tried all the previous solutions mentioned  in Google support forums and unfortunately it was not helpful.

Thank you in advance for your help,

Best,
